item.description:
This is our annual Halloween dance, including a contest for best costume, which is always a blast!


Every Friday at Daniels Hall, Rt 4, Nottingham, NH., single people can meet and dance in a non threatening environment. Very inexpensive, no need to purchase expensive drinks or tip bartenders, bring your own liquor, non alcoholic drinks can be purchased or bring your own and enjoy a fun evening for singles over 30. Join us and meet that special person. Safe place for women attending alone. Visit Daniels Hall for more info and directions or call 603 942-8525 for verbal directions.

Again, no need to buy expensive drinks or tip bartenders, just bring your own liquor, free drink set-ups and hot buffet are included in the $11 admission. Casual dress is a plus which puts people at ease and makes it easier to join in the fun atmosphere. This dance has been working it's magic for 15 years.

Dave McDermott
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess where the meetup table is located.
item.name: Halloween Singles Dance Party
